overview: Vittorio is a 40-year-old journalist who reaches a mid-life crisis. His wife nags him constantly for ignoring her and their child. After his mistress dumps him, Vittorio returns to the town where he spent his childhood to reflect on the state of his life. Flashbacks are used to tell of Vittorioâ€™s relationship with his parents as a child and the effects World War II had on his development.
title: Seasons of Our Love
